name: Cardington Airship Sheds
description: Historical airship hangars used as a film studio in Bedfordshire, England.

content.title: Overview
content.body: **Cardington Airship Sheds** are located in Bedfordshire, England, and were originally built in the early 20th century for the production of airships. They are among the largest clear-span buildings in Britain, making them an ideal location for various large-scale film productions.

content.title: Film History
content.body: The sheds have hosted numerous film productions due to their vast interior space. Notably, they were used for filming scenes from **'Batman Begins'** and **'The Dark Knight Rises'** where part of the Batcave and other large set pieces were constructed. Additionally, the sheds served as a filming site for the movie **'Inception'**.

content.title: Visiting
content.body: While the Cardington Airship Sheds are primarily used for private film productions, occasional public tours and events are held, giving visitors a chance to explore these iconic structures. The current status as a working studio often limits regular public access.
